Package main.java.object

Class Sphere

java.lang.Object
main.java.object.SceneObject
main.java.object.Sphere
public class Sphere extends SceneObject
The Sphere class represents a three-dimensional sphere object in a scene. It extends the SceneObject class and defines methods for intersection testing and loading data from a file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Sphere()
    Constructs a new Sphere object with null material, center, and zero radius.

    • intersect

      public boolean intersect(Ray ray, Scene.Intersection intersection)
      Checks if a ray intersects with the sphere and populates the intersection data.
      Specified by:
      intersect in class SceneObject
      Parameters:
      ray - The ray to test for intersection.
      intersection - An intersection object to populate with data if an intersection is found.
      Returns:
      true if the ray intersects with the sphere, false otherwise.

    • findIntersectionDistance

      public double findIntersectionDistance(Point p, Vector d)
      Finds the distance to the intersection point between the sphere and a ray defined by a point and direction vector.
      Specified by:
      findIntersectionDistance in class SceneObject
      Parameters:
      p - The point of origin for the ray.
      d - The direction vector of the ray.
      Returns:
      The distance to the intersection point, or -1.0 if there is no intersection.
